Class SetMyDefaultAdministratorRights

java.lang.Object
io.github.natanimn.telebof.requests.AbstractBaseRequest<SetMyDefaultAdministratorRights, Boolean>
io.github.natanimn.telebof.requests.set.SetMyDefaultAdministratorRights
public class SetMyDefaultAdministratorRights extends AbstractBaseRequest<SetMyDefaultAdministratorRights, Boolean>
SetMyDefaultAdministratorRights class. Returns True on success.

  • Method Details

    • rights

      public SetMyDefaultAdministratorRights rights(ChatAdministratorRights rights)
      Optional
      Parameters:
      rights - A JSON-serialized object describing new default administrator rights. If not specified, the default administrator rights will be cleared.
      Returns:
      SetMyDefaultAdministratorRights

    • forChannel

      public SetMyDefaultAdministratorRights forChannel(boolean for_channel)
      Optional
      Parameters:
      for_channel - Pass True to change the default administrator rights of the bot in channels. Otherwise, the default administrator rights of the bot for groups and supergroups will be changed.
      Returns:
      SetMyDefaultAdministratorRights
